root.name: Blood & Magic
root.description: Blood Magic was one of the first Forgotten Realms titles on the PC that incorporated a Strategy RPG style in which you had to battle mages. You are a master in the Blood Forge, with which you can create armies to battle other masters. PC Requirements OS: Windows 95Processor: 486/66 MHzMemory: 8 MBHard Drive: 1 MB FreeVideo Memory: 1 MB, SVGASound Card: SoundBlaster CompatibleKeyboard MouseCD/DVD Rom Drive
